member.name: T:GDMechanic.Rng
member.summary: Reimplementation of GDScript's "rand" functions.
member.remarks: Uses System.Random under the hood, so it will not have the same output as GDScript's "rand" functions.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Rng.RandRange(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Random range, any floating point value between from and to.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Rng.Randf
member.summary: Returns a random floating point value between 0 and 1.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Rng.Randi
member.summary: Returns a random 32 bit integer.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Rng.Randomize
member.summary: Randomizes the seed (or the internal state) of the random number generator.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Rng.Seed(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets seed for the random number generator.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Rng.RandRange(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Random range, any integer value between from and to exclusive.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Rng.RandRange(System.Int32)
member.summary: Random range, any integer value between 0 and to exclusive.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Rng.RandRange(System.Single)
member.summary: Random range, any floating point value between 0 and to.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Rng.Chance(System.Single)
member.summary: Randomly returns true or false, based on ratio.

member.name: T:GDMechanic.TimerSystem
member.summary: Node that organizes a collection of timers for easy access through delegates.
member.remarks: Designed to be used with TimerSystemAttribute and TimerReceiverAttribute, although it is fully functional on its own.

member.name: P:GDMechanic.TimerSystem.Timers
member.summary: Dictionary of timers that matches "timeout" method names with corresponding timers.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.TimerSystem.AddTimer(GDMechanic.TimerSystem.TimeoutDelegate,Godot.Timer.TimerProcessMode,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates a new child timer and adds it to the dictionary.
member.returns: A reference to the generated Timer.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.TimerSystem.AddTimer(System.String,Godot.Timer.TimerProcessMode,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates a new child timer and adds it to the dictionary.
member.returns: A reference to the generated Timer.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.TimerSystem.Start(GDMechanic.TimerSystem.TimeoutDelegate)
member.summary: Starts a timer. This also resets the remaining time to waitTime.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.TimerSystem.Start(GDMechanic.TimerSystem.TimeoutDelegate,System.Single)
member.summary: Starts a timer with a custom starting time.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.TimerSystem.Stop(GDMechanic.TimerSystem.TimeoutDelegate)
member.summary: Stops (cancels) a timer.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.ChildAttribute.#ctor(GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.MatchTypes)
member.summary: Returns a reference to a child based on match type.
member.remarks: MatchTypes.Name (default): Fetches the child based on the field/property name converted to PascalCase.
MatchTypes.Type: Fetches the first child that matches the field/property's type.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.GroupAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Adds this node to the specified group.

member.name: T:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.MechanicAttribute
member.summary: Base class for GDMechanic's core attributes. Not required to be extended for wiring.
member.remarks: Only exists for core organization purses.

member.name: T:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.IStateWirer
member.summary: Registers an attribute to be wired based on field/property.

member.name: T:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.IMethodWirer
member.summary: Registers an attribute to be wired based on method.

member.name: T:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.IClassWirer
member.summary: Registers an attribute to be wired based on class/type.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.NodeAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a reference to a node based on the provided node path.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.ParentAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Returns a reference to the node's parent.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.SiblingAttribute.#ctor(GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.MatchTypes)
member.summary: Returns a reference to a sibling based on match type.
member.remarks: MatchTypes.Name (default): Fetches the sibling based on the field/property name converted to PascalCase.
MatchTypes.Type: Fetches the first sibling that matches the field/property's type.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.SignalReceiverAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.SourceTypes)
member.summary: Connects the specified signal from the specified source.
member.remarks: SourceTypes.Path (default): Reads source as a node path.
SourceTypes.Reference: Reads source as the name of a field under the target node which contains a reference to the source node.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.TimerAttribute.#ctor(System.String,Godot.Timer.TimerProcessMode,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a child Timer node with the specified criteria, and assigns a reference to it to the field.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.TimerReceiverAttribute.#ctor(Godot.Timer.TimerProcessMode,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specifies a method to be connected to a timer in the node's TimerSystem.
member.remarks: Can be embedded with either the TimerSystem field itself with the specified timeout method, or directly with the timeout method itself.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.TimerSystemAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Adds a child TimerSystem node, and assigns a reference to it to the field. Also generates timers based on embedded TimerReceiverAttributes in the node.
member.remarks: Does not work with TimerAttribute. Use TimerReceiverAttribute instead for TimerSystem compatibility.
TimerAttribute is meant for individual timer references not related to a TimerSystem.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Wiring.Attributes.TreeNodeAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Fetches the first node in the tree that matches the field/property's type.

member.name: T:GDMechanic.Wiring.CachedNodeInfos.CachedNodeMemberInfo
member.summary: Provides a base for cached node-related MemberInfos.

member.name: T:GDMechanic.Wiring.CachedNodeInfos.CachedNodeMethodInfo
member.summary: Wrapper for a cached node-related MethodInfo.

member.name: P:GDMechanic.Wiring.CachedNodeInfos.CachedNodeMethodInfo.Method
member.summary: The original MethodInfo that has been cached.

member.name: T:GDMechanic.Wiring.CachedNodeInfos.CachedNodeStateInfo
member.summary: Wrapper for a cached node-related FieldInfo or PropertyInfo.

member.name: P:GDMechanic.Wiring.CachedNodeInfos.CachedNodeStateInfo.State
member.summary: The original FieldInfo or PropertyInfo that has been cached.

member.name: T:GDMechanic.Wiring.CachedNodeInfos.CachedNodeType
member.summary: Wrapper for a cached node-related Type and corresponding cached members.

member.name: P:GDMechanic.Wiring.CachedNodeInfos.CachedNodeType.Type
member.summary: The original Type that has been cached.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Wiring.Utils.NormalizeMemberName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts name to PascalCase.

member.name: T:GDMechanic.Wiring.Core
member.summary: The foundation of GDMechanic's wiring system.

member.name: M:GDMechanic.Wiring.Core.Wire(Godot.Node)
member.summary: Wires all GDMechanic attributes embedded in this node's class definition. To be called in _Ready() for any nodes that use GDMechanic's wiring.
